title: New: Max Jury – Love That Grows Old
body:
I’m a sucker for this Tobias Jesso Jr.

\-esque sound. Midway between the 60’s crooners and 80’s classic rock, _Love That Grows Old_, the new song from **Max Jury**, lifted from his self-titled album, is slickly produced whilst managing to maintain the honesty and emotional integrity that makes it so appealing. Check it out below.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
